sources.title: Law of the Pampas
sources.description: “Better than average Hopalong Cassidy film” (IMDB review quote). Hoppy heads to Argentina in this B-western with more plot than shoot-em-up action. However the supporting cast is good and so are the production values. A good lazy afternoon pick for B-oater fans. Filmed at Lone Pine, CA. IMDB rating 7.1. Directed by Nate Watt. Released in 1939. Complete print

metadata.Plot: Hoppy and Lucky deliver cattle to Valdez in Argentina. Merritt is after Valdez's ranch and has his son and daughter killed, supposedly in an accident. Examining the bullet, Hoppy suspects murder. Hoppy then remembers Merritt and finds his picture on an old USA wanted poster.
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Russell Hayden, Sidney Toler
